entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023
